task.title: Add New Record
task.shortdesc: Add a new record to an existing session.

step.cmd: Display the record after which you would like to create a new record and click the New record button in the top left corner of the Session Editor or choose the Session New Record (CMD/CTRL+N) menu item.
step.stepresult: This will create a new record immediately following the selected record. The new record will be visible from the Record Data view.
